en: A spokesman for the Department of Justice today (November 18) said that the Secretary for Justice has not yet recovered and required further treatment following the assault in London. She would provide an update as and when necessary after consulting medical advice. During this period, the Secretary will continue to handle her work as usual. She also expressed gratitude to all who send their kind wishes.
zh: 律政司發言人今日（十一月十八日）表示，律政司司長在倫敦遇襲受傷後需要接受治療，仍然未康復。當諮詢醫生意見後有進一步消息，司長會適時交代。在此期間，司長仍然會繼續處理公務，她亦感謝各界的慰問。

en: A spokesman for the Department of Justice today (November 18) said that the Secretary for Justice has not yet recovered and required further treatment following the assault in London
She would provide an update as and when necessary after consulting medical advice
During this period, the Secretary will continue to handle her work as usual
She also expressed gratitude to all who send their kind wishes.
